resources.string:
Note
Sometimes you will not get same Reward amount as we listed because gift is totally dependent on user's current game level

 Each Reward can be used once per user otherwise you will see message like You Already received the gift from this link!.
Step 1:\nClick on Coin or Spin Gift Button. You will Find list of all latest Gift Links.
Step 2:\nGet the latest Gifts by clicking on each Open button of coin and spin
